com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util

Class MleUnsigned

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wizzer.mle.runtime.util.MleUnsigned

  • public class MleUnsigned
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a collection of utilities for reading/writing MleUnsigned data types in a consistent fashion.
    Author:
    Mark S. Millard

    • Method Detail

      • writeMAC

        public static final int writeMAC(char[] data,
                                 int offset,
                                 long value)
        Converts a 6-byte MAC Address to network byte order and puts it into the specified data array.
        Parameters:
        data - The data arary that will contain the converted value. This is an ouput parameter.
        offset - An offset into the data array identifying where the converted value should be placed.
        value - The 6-byte value to convert.
        Returns:
        The number of bytes converted is returned. This will always be 6

      • writeMAC
